marklogic.body: It is no Secret that many Hispanics are blatant racists towards African Americans as they aspire to be perceived as "all American", particularly in Florida where Hispanics have increasing influence due to their populace. How chilling to see the defendant's father, a former "judge", disparage the dead 17 year old and attempt to defend his son from Cold blooded murder. This sad case simply exposes what is standard procedure in Florida and duplicated in much of the rest of the country. Who was it that said that America should tremble if there is a God?
